data.displayName: Nectr Business Buzz + Controlled Load - Citipower

fees.description: This fee may apply when disconnecting power to your property. Additional charges may be incurred for after hours requests, site-visits and non-payment cases.

This fee may apply when reconnecting power to your property. Additional charges may be incurred for after hours requests or site-visits.
Additional fees and charges may apply. Please see the Nectr fee schedules at https://nectr.com.au/plans-and-fees/vic/citipower/
This fee may apply when a customer requests the network undertake a special meter read.
This fee applies to payments made by debit and credit cards, excluding direct debit.
BPay payments incur a $0.88(inc GST) fee per transaction.

electricityContract.terms: For further information about the terms and conditions applicable to this energy offer, please visit nectr.com.au/terms-and-conditions/#contracts or contact Nectr on hello@nectr.com.au or call 1300 111 211.
electricityContract.variation: We may vary your rates and charges by providing you with notice of any changes as soon as practicable, and no later than your next bill.

eligibility.information: This offer is available to customers with an applicable network tariff. If you are not sure which network tariff you have, please contact us or sign-up online to check this offer is available to you.

singleRate.description: Hours of application are determined by your distributor, Citipower.
